verbose_text: In order to determine the role of autophagy in PA induced inflammatory cytokine expression, we pre-treated the adipocytes with the autophagy inhibitor, 3-MA, for 1 h followed by treatment with PA for 12 h. 3-MA effectively inhibited the induction of autophagy by PA, as evidenced by the decrease in LC3-II accumulation (XREF_FIG).
evidence: PA for 12 h. 3-MA effectively inhibited the induction of autophagy
